<h3 id="X19181">X(19181) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st ANTI-SHARYGIN AND EXTANGENTS</h3>
Barycentrics<br>
a*((b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^3+(b^3+c^3)*a^2-(b^3+c^3)*(b+c)*a-(b^3-c^3)*(b^2-c^2))*(a^2-b^2+c^2)*(a^4-(b^2+2*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*c^2)*(a^2+b^2-c^2)*(a^4-(2*b^2+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*b^2)  :  :  <p>X(19181) lies on these lines: {19,275}, {40,8884}, {54,65}, {55,19182}, {71,8795}, {95,10319}, {97,3101}, {2550,19174}, {3197,19180}, {3779,19197}, {5415,19183}, {5416,19184}, {5584,19172}, {6252,19201}, {6253,19205}, {6254,19206}, {6255,19207}, {6404,19202}, {7688,19192}, {7724,19195}, {8141,19210}, {8251,19179}, {8539,19178}, {8882,10315}, {9792,11435}, {9816,19188}, {10119,19208}, {10306,19173}, {10636,19190}, {10637,19191}, {10902,19185}, {11190,19209}, {11406,16030}, {11445,19167}, {11460,19168}, {11471,19169}, {12417,19196}, {12661,19193}, {12662,19199}, {12663,19200}, {13041,19203}, {13042,19204}, {18406,19177}, {18453,19176}, {18921,19166}, {19133,19171}</p>
